Name: Persuade
Description: Reason with NPC to improve disposition.

Name: Bribe
Description: Pay NPC to ignore crimes or give info.

Name: Charm
Description: Unlock special dialogue with attracted NPCs.

Name: Short Rest
Description: Recover Stamina and small HP amount.

Name: Deep Sleep
Description: Full reset of Fatigue and Sanity.

Name: Meditate
Description: Recover Sanity at cost of Time.
